data.title: Apple Still Looks Expensive But iPhone Launch Could Push It Higher
data.text:
AAPL stock looks somewhat expensive here but Apple's new 5G iPhone launch could be a catalyst.Keep a close eye on it.
The post Apple Still Looks Expensive But iPhone Launch Could Push It Higher appeared first on InvestorPlace.

data.title: Apple TV+ and gaming made a huge splash last year. We haven't heard much from them since
data.text: At Apple's September product launch event last year, two of CEO Tim Cook's splashiest announcements were about the company's new digital subscription services: Apple Arcade and Apple TV+.

data.title: Apple's stock rallies as it holds above 50-day moving average, which has been rising since early-May
data.text: Shares of Apple Inc. AAPL, +2.12% rose 1.8% in afternoon trading, with the stock continuing to hold above the widely watched 50-day moving average (DMA), which many on Wall Street view as a intermediate-term trend tracker.

data.title: Expect new iPad Air and Apple Watch 6 at Apple's Tuesday event, analyst says
data.text: The new iPad Air and Apple Watch models will get significant new features, including a Touch ID fingerprint sensor included in the iPad Air power button, and a blood oxygen sensor in the new Apple Watch 6 models, Kuo predicts.

data.title: Apple expected to unveil updates to Watches, iPads
data.text: Apple Inc will broadcast an event from its Cupertino, California campus on Tuesday where analysts expect it to show updated Apple Watches, iPads and other devices while reserving an iPhone launch for next month.

data.title: What to expect from Apple’s hardware event
data.text: If this was a normal year, we would be settling in for an iPhone event right about now. This is, however, very much not a normal year.

data.title: Apple Stopping People From Earning Money During Recession, Cryptocurrency Exchange Alleges
data.text: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong criticized Apple Inc (NASDAQ: AAPL) on Saturday, saying the latter was stymying its efforts to let its app users earn money using cryptocurrency.
